Table of Contents

  • charts : TOTAL, CLEAR, BT, REFL
  • tabs : byChannel, byRun, OnePlot

Plots
  • TOTAL : Clear+cloudy top of atmosphere radiance for given cloud top pressure and fraction [mW.(cm-1)-1.sr-1.m-2]
  • CLEAR : Clear sky top of atmosphere radiance (channels) [mW.(cm-1)-1.sr-1.m-2]
  • BT : Brightness temperature equivalent to total radiance [K]
  • BT_CLEAR : Brightness temperature equivalent to clear radiance [K]
  • REFL : Reflectance calculated from total radiance [-]
  • REFL_CLEAR : Reflectance calculated from clear radiance [-]

Notebook tabs
byChannel
For each run, view all charts with all channels values
  • -- Run --
    • : choose a run
  • -- ref run --
    • : choose a reference run
  • -- Pseudo Run --
    • : difference with reference run (needs at least 2 different runs)
byRun
For each channel, view all plots with all runs values
  • -- Channel --
    • : choose a channel
  • -- Pseudo Channel --
    • : channels combination in this text field, user can write a formula (see the example displayed in the text field), which will become a pseudo channel.
OnePlot
View one plot
  • TOTAL BT REFL +CLEAR
    • : choose a chart type
  • -- Run --
    • : choose a run
  • -- ref run --
    • : choose a reference run
  • -- Pseudo Run --
    • : difference (minus) or overlay (versus) with reference run
  • -- Channel --
    • : choose a channel
  • -- Pseudo Channel --
    • : channels combination
